MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli, affecting properties in Aberdaron, Rhiw and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:55PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required to broken equipment on the overhead line network. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:45PM on 28th March 2021.
